result.content:
Expand All | Collapse All
 Set Up: .FitniumUserGuide.FitGuides.ApiTest.SetUp (edit)
com.magneticreason.fitnium.BaseFitniumFixture

Set up the browser and connect to selenium

The server is located at localhost
The server is on port 4444
Using the browser *chrome start at http://localhost:8090/fitnium/
check is selenium initialised true
set speed to 100 milliseconds
set timeout to 20000 milliseconds
write to debug starting test

Lets first start at the Fitnium home page at Magnetic Reason

starting at URL testpage4api.html

wait for page to load for 5 seconds

check title of current page Magnetic Reason
check text of element xpath=//h1 Fitnium Test Page

check is Text Present This page contains all the elements neccassary to test Fitnium true

HTML Element Wait APIs

Wait for HTML page source to contain specific HTML code
| wait for html source to contain | source |

Wait for HTML body text to contain specific text
| wait for body text | text | to be present |

Wait for specific text to present anywhere on the page
| wait for text | text | to be present |

Wait for the HTML title to be specific text
| wait for title | title | to be present |

Wait for an Element attribute to be a specific value in current window
| wait for attribute | attribute-locator | to be present |

Wait for an Element attribute to be a specific value in all windows
| wait for attribute | id | from all windows to be present |

Wait for a specific button to be present
| wait for buttons | button-list | to be present |

Wait for a specific list of fields to be present
| wait for fields | field-list | to be present |

Wait for a specific list of links to be present
| wait for links | link| to be present |

Wait for a radio button to be checked
| wait for radio button | locator | to be checked |

Wait for a check box to be checked
| wait for check box | locator | to be checked |

Wait for a specific text to appear in a table
| wait for text | text | in table | table-locator | to occur |

Examples

click the refresh button
wait for html source to contain <div id="content">

click the refresh button
wait for body text Fitnium Test Page to be present

click the refresh button
wait for text Fitnium Test Page to be present

click the refresh button
wait for title Magnetic Reason to be present

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds

wait for attribute firstname@name to be present

click the refresh button
wait for attribute id from all windows to be present

click the refresh button
wait for buttons send to be present

click the refresh button
wait for fields form_telephone,form_email to be present

click the refresh button
wait for links tsandcs to be present

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
click radio button form_sexmale

wait for radio button form_sexmale to be checked

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
click check box form_tsandcs

wait for check box form_tsandcs to be checked

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds

wait for text Are you ? in table testtable.4.0 to occur



Expand All | Collapse All
 Tear Down: .FitniumUserGuide.FitGuides.ApiTest.TearDown (edit)

close the browser
